tasks.label: TestUdpServerKernelModeAndLaunchLLDBServer
tasks.command: cargo test --no-run --test TestUdpServerKernelMode --package voidio && sudo bash -c 'T=$(ls -t target/debug/deps/TestUdpServerKernelMode-* | head -n1); ln -sf "$PWD/$T" $PWD/target/debug/TestUdpServerKernelMode-latest; sudo tools/lldb-server platform --server --listen "*:54321" & echo READY'
